name: Dogtor Pawlov's Romance Repair
description:
Take on the role of Doug E. Pawlov, Dogtor of Psychology, to help dogs repair their relationships! Chat with other dogs on the Ruff Romance couples therapy app and choose the best responses to help them resolve their doggy drama.

(Submission for Global Gam Jam 2020. Theme: Repair)

Programmer, Writer - Colin Markie
Artist, Writer - Kris Gulbinas
Sound, Music - Juseung Lee Ju, Marco Chiavetta
